flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Objective: To investigate the effect of high altitude environment condition on the antioxidation of water extracts fromCelosia cristata L.
sentences.chinese: 探讨高空环境条件对鸡冠花抗氧化功能的影响。

sentences.english: Separation and Identification of Fatty Acid in the Seed Oils of Two New Species of Celosia Cristata L.
sentences.chinese: 两个新品种鸡冠花籽油脂肪酸组分的分离鉴定。

sentences.english: Cockscomb, well looked red, Just like a flame.
sentences.chinese: 鸡冠花，遥遥望往红得像一团火焰。

sentences.english: Ji guan huan was originally growing in Africa, south America and India.
sentences.chinese: 鸡冠花原产于非洲，南美洲与印度。

sentences.english: Studies on the influence of drought -resistent agent of different concentration on the growth of cockscomb.
